model.implementations.components.manifests

Class BasicManifest

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.implementations.components.manifests.BasicManifest
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Manifest
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AtomManifest, SignedManifest

    public abstract class BasicManifest
extends java.lang.Object
implements Manifest
    The BasicManifest defines the base implementation for all other manifests. This class implements some of the methods that can be generalised across all other types of manifests. Manifests extending the BasicManifest MUST provide implementations for the abstract methods defined in this class.
    Author:
    Simone I. Conte "sic2@st-andrews.ac.uk"
